content:
This coverage is effective only if this Policy is purchased before You become aware of any circumstances which could lead to the postponement of Your Trip and within thirty (30) days before the date of commencement of the scheduled Trip.

Once You postpone the Trip and a claim is made under Section 22 for Travel Postponement, the Policy will terminate immediately.
questions: How does the requirement to purchase the policy before becoming aware of any circumstances leading to trip postponement interact with the 30-day purchase window before the scheduled trip commencement?
What are the implications for coverage if the policy is purchased after the insured becomes aware of potential trip postponement circumstances?
In what scenarios would the policy terminate immediately after a claim is made under Section 22 for Travel Postponement?
How does the timing of policy purchase relative to the scheduled trip date affect eligibility for Travel Postponement benefits?
If a trip is postponed multiple times, how does the immediate termination of the policy after the first Travel Postponement claim affect subsequent postponement claims?
What documentation or proof might be required to establish the date of awareness of circumstances leading to trip postponement for coverage eligibility?
How does the policy handle claims if the insured postpones the trip but does not notify the insurer before the postponement?
Are there any exceptions to the policy termination rule after a Travel Postponement claim under Section 22?
How does the policy define 'awareness of any circumstances' that could lead to trip postponement in relation to the purchase timing requirement?
What happens if the policy is purchased exactly 30 days before the scheduled trip and the insured becomes aware of postponement circumstances on the same day?
How does the immediate termination of the policy upon a Travel Postponement claim affect coverage for other sections or benefits?

How does the policy define the 'date of commencement of the scheduled Trip' for the purpose of applying the 30-day purchase requirement?
If the insured postpones the trip and makes a claim under Section 22, what is the process and timeline for policy termination?
